reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Simple and Affordable Notebook
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics Classic Notebook is a simple and affordable notebook that is perfect for everyday use. It has 240 pages of lined paper, a cardboard cover, and an elastic closure. The paper is made from acid-free material, so it will not yellow or deteriorate over time. The notebook is available in a variety of colors, so you can choose one that suits your style.I have been using the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook for a few months now, and I am very happy with it. It is a great notebook for taking notes, jotting down ideas, or sketching. The paper is smooth and easy to write on, and the notebook is sturdy enough to withstand everyday use. I would definitely recommend the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook to anyone looking for a simple and affordable notebook.Here are some of the pros and cons of the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook:Pros:AffordableSimple designAcid-free paperSturdy constructionAvailable in a variety of colorsCons:The paper is not as thick as some other notebooksThe cover is not as durable as some other notebooksOverall, the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook is a great option for anyone looking for a simple and affordable notebook. It is well-made and will last for a long time.Here are some tips for using the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook:Use the notebook for taking notes, jotting down ideas, or sketching.The paper is smooth and easy to write on, so you can use any type of pen or pencil.The notebook is sturdy enough to withstand everyday use, so you can take it with you wherever you go.The notebook is available in a variety of colors, so you can choose one that suits your style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simplicity at Its Best
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics Classic Notebook, a reliable companion for jotting down thoughts, ideas, and scribbles. This no-frills notebook has captured my attention with its simplicity and functionality. It's the perfect blank canvas for unleashing creativity and organizing thoughts in a neat and orderly fashion.Let's start with the design. The classic black, hardcover gives the notebook a sleek and professional appearance. Its compact size, measuring 5 x 8.25 inches, makes it easily portable, fitting snugly into bags or pockets for on-the-go note-taking. It's the epitome of simplicity and practicality.The line-ruled pages offer just the right amount of guidance without overwhelming the space. Whether it's capturing meeting notes, brainstorming ideas, or journaling, the ruled lines provide a structured framework for keeping thoughts organized. The 240 pages offer ample room to fill with thoughts, dreams, and doodles, allowing for extended use before needing to start anew.The durability of the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook is commendable. The hardcover provides protection for the pages, ensuring they remain intact even when subjected to the rigors of everyday use. The quality construction ensures that this notebook can withstand the test of time, making it a reliable companion for all your writing endeavors.Though it may seem like a simple notebook, it serves its purpose beautifully. The absence of unnecessary frills allows the focus to be on the content within. It's a blank canvas waiting to be filled with ideas, dreams, and inspirations. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply someone who enjoys the satisfaction of putting pen to paper, this notebook is a versatile tool that suits all.In summary, the Amazon Basics Classic Notebook proves that simplicity is often the key to success. Its no-nonsense design, compact size, and durable construction make it a nice and straightforward notebook for various purposes. Embrace the simplicity and let your creativity flow within its pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice journal, what's not to like about that?
reviews.reviewText: Great little journal to fit in a bag. It's not fancy but it's inexpensive and gets the job done nicely. Can't go wrong with that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars As advertised but does not lay as flat as pictured
reviews.reviewText: 1st day impressions. Great size. Appears to be of good quality. Does not open as flat as pictured in "Amazon Basics Classic Grid Notebook, Graph Ruled, 240 Pages, Black, Hardcover, 5 x 8.25-Inch" product page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My fiancé and I are recently engaged, and I started a journal of entries written to him that I will give him on our wedding day. I love this journal because it is small and sturdy. The book is black, so I do not have to worry as much about wear and tear on it and it has a strap and bookmark to keep it closed. What I found interesting is that there is a little pocket on the back cover that you can store stuff in which is a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great notebook... similar quality to the name brand at a cheaper price.
reviews.reviewText: I got mine when they were on sale so they were an amazing deal, but even at the normal pricing they end up being cheaper than the name brand and in my use have held up just as well.I really like the built in ribbon to save your location and the small back pocket is handy for small loose papers or receipts you don't want to lose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great little notebook that is exactly what I wanted. Only (small) shortcoming is elastic band used to keep cover closed is a bit wimpy and you must be careful to make it lay correctly. Using it for Zentangle step outs and it works very well with Micron pens. Nice to find something that is just perfect and less expensive than the Moleskins I usually seek out. Thanks Amazon Basics.
Una libreta de buena calidad y a un muy buen precio, se puede transportar fácilmente.

So, here's the real scoop on this notebook—it's a game-changer! 🌟I'm now onto my second one, and honestly, it's just the best bang for your buck. The cover, nice and soft, yet durable, gives it a touch of class. The pages? They're just good, solid quality, and I don't have to tiptoe around with them.Now, the pocket in the back, that's a nifty addition. It's like the notebook went to charm school and learned all the right moves. I've passed on the recommendation to my work buddies, and they're on board too.Writing in this notebook feels genuine. No fluff—just a smooth surface that's open to whatever you want to put on it. Whether it's work notes or a doodle, it's become my trusty sidekick.Bonus: Fountain pen enthusiasts, rejoice! You can use your favorite pen without a worry - this notebook handles it with grace.
utilizzo per il journaling! comodo, compatto, di qualità, ad un ottimo prezzo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it seems way more luxury than an amazon basic, pretty firm casing and nice pages. i planned to come up with a story on how to never buy cheap note books but now plans have changed.
